Line 490:                      <p>Dynamic Bundles</p>
Line 491:                      <ul>
Line 492:                          <li>
Line 493:                              Bundles are auto generated. No need to create bundles yourself.
Line 494:                          </li>
Line 495:                          <li>
Line 496:                              Ensures only required CSS and JavaScript files are loaded, and in the right order.
Line 497:                          </li>
Line 498:                          <li>
Line 499:                              Optimizes client side caching, by combining files into bundles by area, controller, shared and layout. 
Line 500:                          </li>
Line 501:                          <li>
Line 502:                              When CSS and JavaScript files are added or deleted,
Line 503:                              new bundles are automatically generated to take account of this
Line 504:                          </li>
Line 505:                      </ul>

Line 512:          // No need to register bundles in BundleConfig
Line 513:      }
Line 514:  }
